articles.title: Elon Musk’s AI letter is a ‘hot mess’ of hype, say critics
articles.description: A letter signed by Elon Musk and hundreds of experts calling for a pause in the development of artificial intelligence is a "hot mess" of "AI hype" that even misrepresents an academic paper, critics say. Read full story

articles.title: Tesla in talks with China’s CATL on building EV battery plant in the US
articles.description: Tesla has discussed plans to build a battery plant in the US involving Contemporary Amperex Technology with the White House in recent day, sources say. #tesla
